commands.name: enableDebugger
commands.description: Attempt to enable the debugger

commands.name: restartNode
commands.description: Attempt to restart the Node server

commands.name: loadDomainModulesFromPaths
commands.description: Attempt to load command modules from the given paths. The paths should be absolute.

commands.name: watchPath
commands.description: Start watching a file or directory

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path of the file or directory to watch

commands.name: unwatchPath
commands.description: Stop watching a single file or a directory and it's descendants

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path of the file or directory to unwatch

commands.name: unwatchAll
commands.description: Stop watching all files and directories

commands.name: start
commands.description: Creates the WS server

commands.name: send
commands.description: Sends a message to a given client or list of clients

parameters.name: idOrArray
parameters.description: id or array of ids to send the message to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: JSON message to send

commands.name: close
commands.description: Closes the connection to a given client

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of connection to close

parameters.name: clientID
parameters.description: ID of live preview page connecting to live development

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of page that live preview is connecting from

parameters.name: clientID
parameters.description: ID of live preview page sending message

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: JSON message from client page

parameters.name: clientID
parameters.description: ID of live preview page being closed

commands.name: launch
commands.description: Launches a given HTML file in the browser for live development

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: file:// url to the HTML file

parameters.name: browser
parameters.description: browser name

commands.name: _setRequestFilterTimeout
commands.description: Unit tests only. Set timeout value for filtered requests.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Duration to wait before passing a filtered request to the static file server.

commands.name: getServer
commands.description: Starts or returns an existing server for the given path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Absolute filesystem path for root of server.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: Port number to use for HTTP server.  Pass zero to assign a random port.

returns.name: address
returns.description: hostname (stored in 'address' parameter), port, and socket type (stored in 'family' parameter) for the server. Currently, 'family' will always be 'IPv4'.

commands.name: closeServer
commands.description: Closes the server for the given path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path for root of server

returns.name: result
returns.description: indicates whether a server was found for the specific path then closed

commands.name: setRequestFilterPaths
commands.description: Defines a set of paths from a server's root path to watch and fire 'requestFilter' events for.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path for root of server

parameters.name: paths
parameters.description: path to notify

commands.name: writeFilteredResponse
commands.description: Overrides the server response from static middleware with the provided response data. This should be called only in response to a filtered request.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path for root of server

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: path to rewrite

parameters.name: resData
parameters.description: TODO

parameters.name: location
parameters.type: {hostname: string, pathname: string, port: number, root: string: id: number}
parameters.description: request path

commands.name: lintFile
commands.description: lint given file with eslint

commands.name: lintFile
commands.description: lint given file with eslint

commands.name: buildRegistry
commands.description: get a list of extensions from npm

commands.name: installExtension
commands.description: installs an extension into a given path

commands.name: removeExtension
commands.description: removes an extension from a given path

commands.name: validate
commands.description: Verifies that the contents of the given ZIP file are a valid Brackets extension package

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path of the extension package

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: options to control the behavior of the validator

returns.name: errors
returns.description: download error, if any; first string is error code (one of Errors.*); subsequent strings are additional info

returns.name: metadata
returns.description: all package.json metadata (null if there's no package.json)

commands.name: install
commands.description: Installs the given Brackets extension if it is valid (runs validation command automatically)

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path of the extension package

parameters.name: destinationDirectory
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path where this extension should be installed

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: installation options: disabledDirectory should be set so that extensions can be installed disabled.

returns.name: errors
returns.description: download error, if any; first string is error code (one of Errors.*); subsequent strings are additional info

returns.name: metadata
returns.description: all package.json metadata (null if there's no package.json)

returns.name: disabledReason
returns.description: reason this extension was installed disabled (one of Errors.*), none if it was enabled

returns.name: installationStatus
returns.description: Current status of the installation (an extension can be valid but not installed because it's an update

returns.name: installedTo
returns.description: absolute path where the extension was installed to

returns.name: commonPrefix
returns.description: top level directory in the package zip which contains all of the files

commands.name: update
commands.description: Updates the given Brackets extension (for which install was generally previously attemped). Brackets must be quit after this.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path of the extension package

parameters.name: destinationDirectory
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path where this extension should be installed

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: installation options: disabledDirectory should be set so that extensions can be installed disabled.

returns.name: errors
returns.description: download error, if any; first string is error code (one of Errors.*); subsequent strings are additional info

returns.name: metadata
returns.description: all package.json metadata (null if there's no package.json)

returns.name: disabledReason
returns.description: reason this extension was installed disabled (one of Errors.*), none if it was enabled

returns.name: installationStatus
returns.description: Current status of the installation (an extension can be valid but not installed because it's an update

returns.name: installedTo
returns.description: absolute path where the extension was installed to

returns.name: commonPrefix
returns.description: top level directory in the package zip which contains all of the files

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes the Brackets extension at the given path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: absolute filesystem path of the installed extension folder

commands.name: downloadFile
commands.description: Downloads the file at the given URL, saving it to a temp location. Callback receives path to the downloaded file.

parameters.name: downloadId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this download 'session'

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to download from

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: optional proxy URL

returns.description: Local path to the downloaded file

commands.name: abortDownload
commands.description: Aborts any pending download with the given id. Ignored if no download pending (may be already complete).

parameters.name: downloadId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this download 'session', previously pased to downloadFile

returns.description: True if the download was pending and able to be canceled; false otherwise

commands.name: execute
commands.description: Runs a command in a shell and buffers the output.

commands.name: spawn
commands.description: Launches a new process with the given command.

commands.name: kill
commands.description: Launches a new process with the given command.

commands.name: which
commands.description: Looks for a given file using which.

commands.name: pathExists
commands.description: Looks if given path exists on the file system
